strapiPost.title: Weekend Round Up
strapiPost.content:
Welcome to your weekend! Here are a few fun things you could add to your plans:

  • Itching for finds: Discover local crafts and fun antiques at the Flea in the Park event at Blowing Springs Park in Bella Vista today and Saturday from 9a-4p. 
  • Raise a glass: Don't miss the Oktoberfest themed First Friday this evening in Downtown Bentonville!
  • On fire: The 7th annual Frisco Inferno BBQ Competition takes place in Downtown Rogers Saturday at 301 S. 1st Street at the center of all the Downtown happenings related to Bikes Blues & BBQ. 
  • Don't be a square: The Razorback Greenway will be filled with fun as the Square 2 Square Bike Ride takes off tomorrow morning! 
  • Bluegrass: Springdale native and multiple CMA winner, Jenee Fleenor, is performing at the Botanical Garden of the Ozarks tonight at 7p. 
  • Choo-choo: Participants will be judged for their creative train creations and race through an obstacle course in the The Great Cardboard Train Race at the Rogers Historical Museum this Saturday at 10a. 
  • Vintage: Get your tickets for Vintage Market Days this Friday, Saturday, and Sunday at the Benton County Fairgrounds. 
  • For a ride: Enjoy the various musical performances, car and bike show events, and great food this weekend at the Bikes, Blues, & BBQ Motorcycle Rally in Rogers. 
  • Have a bier: Raise a glass and enjoy a Bavarian pretzel at the grand opening of Busshaus Biergarten tomorrow night. 
  • Swing batter swing: After Arkansas softball’s’ doubleheader on Sunday, fans can take an at-bat and anyone who hits a home run will receive FREE 2023 Razorback softball season tickets.

Wishing you a wonderful weekend, NWA! See you next week.
